title: [Large-Scale] 3D Digital Game-Based Second Language Acquisition Strategy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic SLA (Second Language Acquisition) theory and experience with digital game integration
context.additional_context: A 3D-GDBL workshop for practicing elementary school teachers to design English lessons integrated with social studies subjects

learning_goals: Learners design at least three context-specific conversational scenarios for second language acquisition (SLA) in 3D game environments
Learners analyze two types of context-based language learning models utilizing in-game narrative structures
Learners create 3D-DGBL prototype storyboards executable in BYOD environments and conduct peer evaluations

resources: Game Development Tool (Unity/Unreal Engine Educational License)
SLA (Second Language Acquisition) Theory Resource Package
BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Compatible Assessment Rubric

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
